text: Jara tumhi loka nirnaya icchita asala tara to nirnaya tumacyasamora ahe, ani jara thambala tara he tumacyasathi phara uttama ahe ani jara tumhidekhila teca kama karala tara amhidekhila teca kama karu, maga tumaca samudaya tumacya kahica upayogi padanara nahi, maga sankhyene kitihi motha aso. Khari gosta hi ahe ki sarvasrestha allaha imana rakhanaryancya sobata ahe
